name: Finder Love: Kudou Risa - First Shoot wa Kimi to
name_original: Finder Love: Kudou Risa - First Shoot wa Kimi to
description:
Finder Love: Kudou Risa - First Shoot wa Kimi to is an action game. It was originally released in 2012.
You can play Finder Love: Kudou Risa - First Shoot wa Kimi to on PSP.
